summary: This is a brief email exchange from December 1, 2018, regarding the Miami Herald's reporting on the Jeffrey Epstein sex trafficking case. The correspondence appears to be internal communication about staffing or opening a file on the story, referencing a specific Miami Herald article published on November 30, 2018.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the Miami Herald article and the sex trafficking case being discussed in the email exchange.

events.title: Miami Herald Article Publication
events.description: The Miami Herald publishes an article about the Jeffrey Epstein sex trafficking case and accusations.

keyFacts: The document is an email exchange dated December 1, 2018, regarding the Jeffrey Epstein case.
It references a Miami Herald article published on November 30, 2018, about the Epstein sex trafficking case.
The correspondence discusses whether to 'open' on the story and confirms it is 'staffed already' and 'on the d/1 for now'.
The email includes a link to the Miami Herald article (partially redacted in the text).
